Package nom.tam.util

  • Class
    Description
    ArrayDataFile
    Efficient reading and writing of arrays to and from files, with custom encoding.
    ArrayDataInput
    Interface for reading array data from inputs.
    ArrayDataOutput
    Interface for writing array data to outputs.
    ArrayFuncs
    This is a package of static functions which perform computations on arrays.
    ArrayInputStream
    Efficient reading of binary arrays from streams with custom binary encoding.
    ArrayOutputStream
    Efficient reading of binary arrays from streams with custom binary encoding.
    AsciiFuncs
     
    BufferDecoder
    Deprecated.
    This is a rusty rail implementation only, unsafe for general use.
    BufferedDataInputStream
    Deprecated.
    Use FitsInputStream instead which provides the same functionality with a less misleading name, or else use ArrayInputStream as a base for a more generic implementation for any (non-FITS) encoding.
    BufferedDataOutputStream
    Deprecated.
    Use FitsOutputStream, which provides the exact same functionality but with a less misleading name, or else use ArrayOutputStream as a base for an implementation with any (non-FITS) encoding.
    BufferedFile
    Deprecated.
    Use FitsFile instead, which replaces the old BufferedFile with a less misleading name, or else ArrayDataFile, which provides a base for a more more generic implementation for efficient reading/writing arrays using any (non-FITS) encoding.
    BufferEncoder
    Deprecated.
    This is a rusty rail implementation only, unsafe for general use.
    BufferPointer
    Deprecated.
    It is a rusty-rail compatibility implementation only, unsafe for general use.
    ByteArrayIO
    A class for reading and writing into byte arrays with a stream-like interface.
    ByteBufferInputStream
     
    ByteBufferOutputStream
     
    ByteFormatter
    Deprecated.
    This class should not be exposed in the publi API and is meant for internal use only in ASCII tables.
    ByteParser
    Deprecated.
    This class should not be exposed in the public API and should be for internal use only in ASCII tables.
    ColumnTable<T>
    A data table is conventionally considered to consist of rows and columns, where the structure within each column is constant, but different columns may have different structures.
    ComplexValue
    A no-frills complex value, for representing complex numbers in FITS headers.
    Cursor<KEY,VALUE>
    This interface extends the Iterator interface to allow insertion of data and move to previous entries in a collection.

    DataTable
    This interface defines the properties that a generic table should have.
    FitsDecoder
    Class for decoding FITS-formatted binary data into Java arrays.
    FitsEncoder
    Class for encoding select Java arrays into FITS binary format.
    FitsFile
    This class is intended for high performance reading and writing FITS files or block of FITS-formatted data.
    FitsInputStream
    This class is intended for high performance reading FITS files or blocks of FITS data.
    FitsIO
    super closable interface for all fits reader/writers.
    FitsOutput
    Interface for FITS-specific output.
    FitsOutputStream
    This class is intended for high performance writing FITS files or FITS data blocks.
    FlexFormat
    Formatting number values for use in FITS headers.
